Data.Description: The norm of the surface velocity (m s^-1) from CISM initialization dataset (left; Joughin et al., 2010a,b), CISM-Albany after spin-up (middle), and their difference (CISM-A - init) over Greenland.
Data.Title: Surface velocity norm over Greenland

Data.Description: The norm of the surface velocity (m s^-1) from CISM initialization dataset (left; Joughin et al., 2010a,b), CISM-Albany after spin-up (middle), and their difference (CISM-A - init) over Jakobshavn glacier (West Greenland; Zwally et al. (2012) basins 7).
Data.Title: Surface velocity norm over Jakobshavn glacier

Data.Description: The norm of the surface velocity (m s^-1) from CISM initialization dataset (left; Joughin et al., 2010a,b), CISM-Albany after spin-up (middle), and their difference (CISM-A - init) over Petermann glacier (North-West Greenland; Zwally et al. (2012) basins 1).
Data.Title: Surface velocity norm over Petermann glacier

Data.Description: The norm of the surface velocity (m s^-1) from CISM initialization dataset (left; Joughin et al., 2010a,b), CISM-Albany after spin-up (middle), and their difference (CISM-A - init) over North-East Greenland (Zwally et al. (2012) basins 1 and 2).
Data.Title: Surface velocity norm over North-East Greenland

Data.Description: Surface mass balance (kg m^-2 a^-1) over Greenland for CISM-Albany after spin-up forced with RACMO 2.0 (left), RACMO 2.3 (right), and their difference (CISM-Albany - RACMO 2.3) with CISM-Albany interpolated to the coarser RACMO 2.3 grid.
Data.Title: Surface mass balance over Greenland

Data.Description: Comparison of the surface mass balance (kg m^-2 a^-1) at grid point over Greenland for RACMO 2.3 and CISM-Albany (after spin-up forced by RACMO 2.0) interpolated to the coarser RACMO grid.
Data.Title: Surface mass balance comparison

Elements.Data:

Description: An analysis of CISM-Albany's Greenland dynamics.
Title: dynamics_cisma
